title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8128.00 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8128.00 - General

State Regulations
(a) Old Country

Road, a county road, between Glen Cove Road and Merrick Avenue, a distance of
1.6 miles, is designated as an access highway for special dimension vehicles; provided, however, that this route shall only be used between the hours of 7
p.m. and 7 a.m. in the Towns of Hempstead and North Hempstead. (b) Route 135. Route 135 between interchange
44 of I-495 and Route 27, in the Towns of Oyster Bay and Hempstead. (c) Route 27. Route 27 between Route 135 and

Satterie Avenue in the Villages of Valley Stream, Lynbrook, Rockville Centre
and Freeport and the Town of Hempstead. (f) New Hyde Park Road between I-495 and

Franklin Avenue. (g) Franklin

Avenue between New Hyde Park Road and Pathmark Facility, Franklin

Square. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8128.00

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
